Article text: Madame X   is a  lost    1    1916 American  silent   drama film  directed by  George F  Marion  based on the 1908 play by French playwright  Alexandre Bisson   1848–1912     2     Dorothy Donnelly   star of the 1910 Broadway production of the play—also directed by Marion—reprised her starring role for the film     A woman is thrown out of her home by her jealous husband and sinks into depravity  Twenty years later  she finds herself accused of murder for saving her son  who does not know who she is  He finds himself defending her without knowing her background
